post:
Invpsus.com is introducing it’s updated Pure SSD VPS packages with advanced features. Our VPS servers are really big, fast and powerful, but one of cheapest in the industry at the same time. There are different plans for everyone, you may choose the pricing that fits your business needs - it includes both monthly and hourly prices.

We are using KVM virtualization. Your RAM and Disk allotments are dedicated and guaranteed.

Our all VPS plans include the following features:

• Free instant setup
• KVM Virtualization
• Pure SSD storage
• Full Root Access
• Outstanding Support 24/7
• Best control panels
• Free backups
• Free migration assistance


VPS-1 - $3/month, $0.004/hour
512 MB RAM
1 vCPU
15 GB SSD Storage
1 IP
3 TB Bandwidth


VPS-2 - $5/month, $0.006/hour
1 GB RAM

We aim to use only top-notch hardware resources for the best performance of your websites, that’s why your VPS will be hosted on powerful Eight Core enterprise-grade Quanta servers in Netherlands DC.

To know more about our company please visit our website https://invpsus.com/

If you have a question please contact us via https://invpsus.com/billing/contact.php or via an email support@invpsus.com
